definition: see 重出江湖 [chong2 chu1 jiang1 hu2]

sentences.english: Anyone who has imagined what life was like before the agrarian revolution can find out here.
sentences.chinese: 凡是能想象到的農業革命前的生活都能在這裏重現。

sentences.english: Thesame old favourites recur year in year out with monotonous regularity.
sentences.chinese: 一些相同的老嗜好年復一年地以單調的規律重現。

sentences.english: Tepi - the return of ancient knowledge at the end of this Cycle of Time.
sentences.chinese: 在這時間週期結束重現的遠古知識。
你想讓底特律活力重現？

sentences.english: Marie Deakin 's help, to make barren garden back to life.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗在狄肯的幫助下，使荒蕪的花園重現生機。

sentences.english: The results from these studies illustrate the high sensitivity of the instrument and its ability to generate reproducible binding responses.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明了儀器的高靈敏度和鍵合響應的重現性。

sentences.english: One woman in a fading Japanese village is slowly replacing its dead residents with scarecrows.
sentences.chinese: 正在凋落的日本村莊中，一位婦人用布偶重現舊人。

sentences.english: As such incidents are erased in full, they shall cease to recur again in Earth's future.
sentences.chinese: 當這些痛苦被充分抹除，它們將停止在地球未來重現。

sentences.english: Seriality and visual repetition in his work underline this aspect.
sentences.chinese: 他作品中的連續性和視覺重現強調了這個方向。

sentences.english: In a reenactment scene, Khmer men working with stone grinding construction.
sentences.chinese: 舊時重現的現場，高棉人用石頭打磨建築。

sentences.english: But London Fashion Week is back in style.
sentences.chinese: 但倫敦時裝週又重現時尚風光。

sentences.english: Traditional holography consists of wavefront recording and reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 經典光全息術包括波陣面記錄和波陣面重現兩步。

sentences.english: All the tests showed good repeatability and reliability in GICA.
sentences.chinese: 並具有很好的重現性和穩定性。

sentences.english: In a reenactment scene, workers digging inside a canal.
sentences.chinese: 舊時重現的現場，人們在挖掘隧道。

sentences.english: The artist has reproduced your features very well in this portrait.
sentences.chinese: 這位藝術家在這幅畫像中把你的容貌重現得維妙維肖。

sentences.english: He told the Happy Prince that everyone looked happy again.
sentences.chinese: 他告訴快樂王子每個人又重現了歡顏。

definition: to restore to the original state/to reconstruct (an event)/reduction (chemistry)
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
(of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
